Detailed Description

The header file describes the Low Sink Interface API.

Function Documentation

bool zgpRemoveSinkPairingInfo ( ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t *  currentEntry,
ZGP_SinkGroup_t *  groupListToBeRemoved,
uint8_t  commMode 
)

remove the pairing information in sink table(pre-commissioned mode)

Parameters:
[in]currentEntry- pointer to sink table entry to be updated groupListToBeRemoved - groupList to be removed commMode - communication mode to be depaired sendPairing - bool to enabled/disable pairing tx
Returns:
true - if entry becomes empty false otherwise
bool zgpAddExtendSinkTableEntry ( ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t *  currEntry,
ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t *  sinkTableEntry 
)

add or extend the sink information for an entry

Parameters:
[in]currEntry- pointer to the entry to be added (or) extended sinkTableEntry - pointer to the entry to be copied
Returns:
true -If Entry is Updated Successfully false -If Entry is not updated Successfully(Can be due to Insufficinet Space)
void zgpFillGpdInfoOfSinkTableEntry ( ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t *  currEntry,
ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t *  sinkTableEntry 
)

fill GPD info of sink table entry

Parameters:
[in]currEntry- pointer to the entry to be replaced sinkTableEntry - pointer to the entry to be copied
Returns:
None
